list_definition.definition: to take place or occur; to occur by chance

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: It just so happens / As it happens, I have the key in my pocket.

list_definition.mean_english: cái gì đã xảy ra với người/vật
list_definition.definition: (usually with to) to be done to (a person, thing etc)

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: She’s late – something must have happened to her.

list_definition.definition: to do or be by chance

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: He happens to be my friend.

list_ex_of_english: How much of this really happened is, as always, hard to say.
Workers will increasingly be faced with the choice of whether to retire at a time of their choosing or to wait and see what happens.
Because ageing is concerned with what happens in time, we are impressed with not only the multi-dimensional nature of time, but also with its complexity.
Liberalisation happened only very gradually, and with conscious trade-offs.
Years are not empty containers : important things happened in that time.
They didn't believe it was happening to their son.
In existing herding models, either a crisis happens or it does not.
What might be happening psychologically in these situations?
